sentences.en: A thick haze of acrid smoke hung in the air.
sentences.cn: 空气中弥漫着刺鼻的浓烟。
燃烧轮胎产生的刺鼻气味

sentences.en: An acrid smell filled the air.
sentences.cn: 空气中弥漫着刺鼻的气味.

sentences.en: He looked at them with a smile both acrid and desolate.
sentences.cn: 他带着辛辣、凄凉的微笑看着他们.
我把辛辣的药水一口咽了下去.

sentences.en: I like essays with an acrid flavour.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢风格泼辣的文章.

sentences.en: Sulfur oxides ( SOX. ) are acrid, corrosive, poisonous gases produced when fuel containing sulfur is burned.
sentences.cn: 硫氧化物 ( SOX ) 是辛辣的腐蚀性的有毒气体,产生于含硫燃料的燃烧.

sentences.en: The acrid smell carried across the table.
sentences.cn: 一股辛辣的味道在桌子周围弥漫开来.

sentences.en: The air is thick with acrid smoke from the fires.
sentences.cn: 空气中弥漫着火灾产生的刺鼻浓烟。

sentences.en: The plant has an unpleasant odour and an acrid taste.
sentences.cn: 这种植物闻着刺鼻，吃着辣口。

sentences.en: The room filled with the acrid smell of tobacco.
sentences.cn: 房间里弥漫着刺鼻的烟草味。

sentences.en: The room was filled with acrid smoke.
There is an acrid tone to your remarks.
sentences.cn: 你说这些话的口气带有讥刺意味.

sentences.en: This is an acrid and pungent substance.
sentences.cn: 这是一种辛辣而带刺激性的物质.

sentences.en: We do not like his acrid temper.
sentences.cn: 我们不喜欢他刻毒的性情.
